text: Vengeance (2011) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by WWE. It took place on October 23, 2011, at the AT&T; Center in San Antonio, Texas. It was the eighth Vengeance event held by WWE, the first since Vengeance: Night of Champions in 2007, and the last until 2021 when Vengeance returned as an NXT TakeOver event called Vengeance Day. ==Results== ==References== ==Other websites== *Vengeance 2011 WWE Live Tour site *Vengeance 2011 on WWE.com Category:2011 in professional wrestling Category:Sports in San Antonio, Texas Category:WWE Vengeance Category:2011 in American television Category:2010s in Texas Category:2011 in Texas
title: Vengeance (2011)
